name: DENTAL_PROC_MODIFIERS_HX
description: This table extracts the history of changes to a dental procedure's modifiers.

columns.name: FINDING_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the finding record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the associated procedure modifier edit history in the dental procedure record. Together with FINDING_ID, this forms the foreign key to the DENTAL_PROCEDURE_HX table.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the procedure modifier histories associated with the dental procedure from the DENTAL_PROCEDURE_HX table.

columns.name: DENTAL_PROC_HX_MODIFIER_ID
columns.description: This item contains the history of procedure modifiers associated with a dental procedure. These procedure modifiers allow users to add additional details to their dental procedures.

columns.name: DENTAL_PROC_HX_MODIFIER_ID_MODIFIER_NAME
columns.description: The name of the modifier record.
